synopsis.text: So aked in the mundane life of a typical middle school girl, Yoshino Hide finds herself inexplicably drawn to a local shrine, hoping for divine intervention for her upcoming test. A curious blue light and a clumsy stumble later, she interrupts a stranger's magic spell, only to be catapulted back in time to the Sengoku Era. In this alternate universe, Yoshino encounters the powerful Oda Nobunaga and Akechi Mitsuhide, but with a twist - everyone in this world is female! As she navigates this strange new reality, Yoshino decides to aid Nobunaga in her quest to find the fabled Crimson Armor, said to grant its wearer dominion over all of Japan. Brace yourself for a thrilling ride as Yoshino rewrites history in this captivating anime, filled with courage, camaraderie, and an all-female cast.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
